# USAccDeaths


```{r fig.width=7.5}
(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::glm.nb, attention = TRUE, type_pi = "conformal-split", method="adj")))
plot(obj)
```
